thread.title: Veteran actor Farooq Zamir passes away
thread.title_full: Veteran actor Farooq Zamir passes away

author: Waleed Tariq
title: Veteran actor Farooq Zamir passes away
text:
Veteran TV actor Farooq Zamir has passed away following a prolonged illness. Farooq Zameer passes away. Great actor, the epitome of desi class and elegance pic.twitter.com/Sz3SMd5DZQ 
— Fasi Zaka (@fasi_zaka) February 23, 2017 
According to Express News , Zamir was admitted to CMH, Lahore after encountering breathing problems. However, he could not recover and passed away Thursday evening. 
Starting his career with Pakistan Television in the 90s, his famous drama serials include ‘ Rani’, ‘Gurya’ and ‘Suraagh Zindagi’ among others.
